txt.en: Darfin can be found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou have doused many lingering fires at Zarkul-sulûn. You should report to Darfin.
Although the Gabil'akkâ were able to win a foothold at Zarkul-sulûn, lingering fires from the battle endanger the dwarves and their supplies at Zarkul-sulûn.
Fires can be found throughout Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nDarfin has asked you to douse lingering fires throughout Zarkul-sulûn.

'Hail, [placeholder]!

'It was a long battle, but Zarkul-sulûn has been won for the Gabil'akkâ. However, the fires of battle still burn among our ranks... and too near to our supplies for my liking!

'Would you aid me and douse some of the fires that still linger?'
'You have my thanks, [placeholder].\n\n'Zarkul-sulûn must not be allowed to fall to the Orcs!'
